content: I've noticed online that the military offers free cosmetic surgeries. This baffles me because I was just disqualified from signing up for the national guard because I currently have breast implants. I have saline implants, which is salt water... which means if they rupture in the line of duty or in general I will not fall ill. My question is, is there anyone that has been disqualified because they had a cosmetic procedure that has nothing to do with their health or being a solider?
reply: I've noticed online that the military offers free cosmetic surgeries. My question is, is there anyone that has been disqualified because they had a cosmetic procedure that has nothing to do with their health or being a solider?
title: Breast augmentation
